name: Coin Toss (TheAlternateDoctor)
description:
Coin Toss! Once a rather small minigame from Rhythm Paradise on the DS and the 3DS, now still a rather small minigame but on your computer of choice. Now with added disruptions!

The source is available here

Special thanks: 

  • Spriters resource for most of the graphics, extracted from Rhythm Paradise DS
  • The RHRE Database for providing both the cowbell sounds and the drum beat
  • Khinsider for the Rhythm Paradise Megamix version of the drum beat
